law.catch_line: Division of subject matter of administrative regulation.

text.section: An administrative body shall divide the general subject matter of administrative regulations it promulgates into topics. A separate administrative regulation shall be promulgated for each topic.

An administrative body shall not incorporate all material relating to a general subject matter in one (1) administrative regulation. Material incorporated by reference shall be incorporated by reference in the administrative regulation governing the specific topic to which the material relates.
When an administrative regulation is amended, it shall be amended or repealed, whichever is applicable, to comply with the requirements of KRS Chapter 13A.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 516, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990.
